entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is a wizard and was kept hidden by his relatives.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is Harry's headmaster at Hogwarts and has a sister who was imprisoned for lack of magic.

entities.name: kendra
entities.description: Kendra is Dumbledore's sister who was imprisoned by her brother.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is Dumbledore's sister who was imprisoned and possibly killed by her mother.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is a relative of Harry's who suggests that Kendra might have been killed by Ariana.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is a relative of Harry's who is shocked by Muriel's suggestion.

relationships.description: Muriel suggests that she might be Ariana's mother.
Muriel suggests that she might be Ariana's mother.
